text: 9:12 Ua Me Ini 34:11-16; Godɨn Araziba 7:1-5Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia uan guiviba men otaribar anɨngan markɨ. Egh uan otariba men guivibar anɨngan markɨ. Egh me deravɨra ikɨsɨ ia men akurvaghan markɨ. Egh me damuamin biziba, ia men akurvaghan markɨ. Ia deraghvɨra nan akam baregh, egh deravɨra dapiagh gavgavigham. Eghtɨ ian ovavir boriba nguazir kamɨn deravɨra dapiagh gavgavigh, nguazir kamɨn dagher aghuibar amɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.
